attributes.review: Iâ€™ve never felt more disrespected in my life. From the MOMENT I downloaded all I saw from the app was disrespect. I say  â€œI feel like I really want black people to have equal rights?â€ She replies â€œohhh They had that yesterday.â€ I wasnâ€™t aware that she was, an evil... beast?
